
## Cohen's Kappa

Description: calculates weighted and unweighted kappa statistics and their 95% confidence intervals.


```{r}
#! label="GetVCDPkg"
library(vcd)
```


```{r}
#! label = "{{DataName}}.K"
{{DataName}}.K <- Kappa({{DataName}})
summary({{DataName}}.K)
print({{DataName}}.K, CI = TRUE)
```
